content: Look what we have: .......ReTW is small handheld system designed to detect and localize live entities through solid obstacles...... Sounds like a good thing to either find people under debris after some kind of disasters or it may be a good thing for military/police missions. Don´t you think? for more info: (remove ++ at the beginning) +++http://www.retia.eu/index.php?lng=en&id=392&doc=

title: Look behind the walls
